title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. IV, subch. G, pt. 480 - Utility Contract And Procurement Procedures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. IV, subch. G, pt. 480 - Utility Contract And Procurement Procedures

State Regulations
§ 480.1 - Utility contract and procurement procedures
§ 480.2 - Filing of changes in procedures
§ 480.3 to 480.4 - Renumbered

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. IV, subch. G, pt. 480

Statutory authority: Public Service Law, §§ 4[1], 5[2], 7[1], 16 [1], 20[1], 115

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
